name: Sidebarred: A TypeRacer Theme
description: A minimalistic theme for TypeRacer that allows you to see all the important stuff all at once with handy sidebars. Black, blue, with a hint of rainbow.
additional_info:
Beta 2

- Fixes for repeating/viewing your last 10 in a pop up. - Made the personal graph smaller

Beta!

This is the first version of the theme. Let me know what you think on the TypeRacer Discord. I'm @ted

discussions.name: This is one of the best styles I've seen on this site.
